item.title: Silver Saddle
item.description: Silver Saddle, is a 1978 Spaghetti Western. It is the third and final western directed by Lucio Fulci and one of the last spaghetti westerns to be produced by a European studio. The film was based on an original story written by screenwriter Adriano Bolzoni and directed by Fulci for the Italian studio Rizzoli Film Productions.

item.title: Django 2
item.description: Django Strikes Again is a 1987 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Nello Rossati. It is the only official sequel to Django.
